function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unhygienic condition of the neighbourhood leading to the spread of contagious diseases such as COVID-19.","Impact":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 and other contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Maintenance of hygiene in the neighbourhood, implementing health and safety guidelines.","Technologies":"Sanitization equipment, IoT-based health monitoring systems.","People":"Residents, local community members, health and safety authorities.","Owner":"Local community leaders, municipal authorities, health and safety organizations."},{"Description":"Transmission risk in common areas such as stairwells, lifts, and parking lots of buildings.","Impact":"High risk of transmission of contagious diseases among residents and visitors.","Mitigation":"Modification of common areas to reduce transmission risk, enforcement of health and safety guidelines.","Technologies":"Contactless access systems, air purification systems.","People":"Building residents, visitors, facility management staff.","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance team."},{"Description":"The need for effective guidelines for social communication and socialization to prevent the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Difficulty in maintaining social communication while adhering to health and safety guidelines.","Mitigation":"Implementation of social distancing policies, dissemination of knowledge and awareness through controlled socialization.","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, communication apps for health awareness.","People":"Community members, social groups, policymakers.","Owner":"Local community leaders, social organizations, policymakers."}]}
